title: Weed-Control Machines - Crossroad Farm Fairlee VT

tasks.task: Operating a farm with mixed vegetable crops, including corn, tomatoes, and bedding plants.
subtasks: Managing corn cultivation to prevent weed growth without using herbicides.
Using a single-row cultivator and rolling Lilliston cultivator for weed control in corn fields.
Employing rotary hoes for blind cultivation in corn, peas, and beans to control weeds and reduce pressure on the main crop.
Addressing the challenge of the rotary hoe picking up loose plastic from neighboring crops.
Utilizing husky Bat Wings (Kerb Co. models) for single-row cultivation in mature weeds and witchgrass.
Implementing a two-row budding basket weeder for lettuce cultivation, ensuring precision and minimizing dirt disturbance.
Preparing field beds through subsoiling, manuring, and rotavating, with an intention to explore alternatives for improved soil structure.
